thread.section_title: Envato Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Envato | www.envato.com
thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text:
I purchased multiple themes here already. Unfortunately the last theme was not as expected so I requested a refund, removed all the file and purchased a different theme which was actually what I was looking for.
Refund was denied because the author of the theme doesn't want to give us a refund. It is very sad to be treated like this after purchasing multiple products there already.
This was the last time...
